name: .ZVPL File Extension
summary: Learn about .ZVPL files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Software license file used by the Visual Paradigm Suite, a suite of diagramming and documentation applications; saves registration information for one or more programs; enables users to activate trial and purchased versions of the software.

content: ZVPL files are made available from Visual Paradigm via an email attachment or from website download link provided in the registration response email. After receiving the file, you use it during the installation process when the installer asks for the license file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
